original_title: Beatrix Potter: Artist, Storyteller, And Countrywoman
overview: This documentary film about the life of the remarkable author and illustrator of THE TALE OF PETER RABBIT, is based on the successful biography, BEATRIX POTTER: ARTIST, STORYTELLER AND COUNTRYWOMAN by Judy Taylor.
tagline: This documentary film about the life of the remarkable author and illustrator of THE TALE OF PETER RABBIT, is based on the successful biography, BEATRIX POTTER: ARTIST, STORYTELLER AND COUNTRYWOMAN by Judy Taylor.
title: Beatrix Potter: Artist, Storyteller, And Countrywoman
